metadata.synopsis: Short dialogues when i'm done doing the main 'looting' scene with this character.
metadata.how_to_trigger: To trigger Greeting nodes -1. loadlevel WLD_Main_A2. goto -607.02, 0.54, 410.793. Talk with Brathwen.To trigger Greeting (has met)1. loadlevel WLD_Main_A2. goto -607.02, 0.54, 410.793. Finish the first dialogue about the corpses and loot4. Talk to Brathwen again.To trigger Greeting (DEEPGNOME has met)1. loadlevel WLD_Main_A2. Put the mouse pointer over your character and use the recon command: "addTag DEEPGNOME:2bbc3217-3d8c-46e6-b599-a0f1c9063f9a "3. goto -607.02, 0.54, 410.794. Finish the first dialogue about the corpses and loot5. Talk to Brathwen again.

0.speaker: Brathwen
0.text: Hey! Get back with the others. Now.

1.speaker: Brathwen
1.text: Some of us don't have time to faff about.

2.speaker: Brathwen
2.text: Any of those Absolutists see you muckin' around and you're toast.

3.speaker: Brathwen
3.text: I ain't playing with you, svirfy.
